The 5^th^ [demcoratising forecasting workshop](https://www.bahmanrt.com/#democtarisingf)  will take place in [Makerere University Business School](https://mubs.ac.ug/) in April 2019.
Democratising forecasting is an intiaitive lead by Bahman Rostami-Tabar. The aim is to share knownoledge on forecasting and influence relevant practices prioritising the need of population and the society.
